 Board of Adjustments

BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT
-------------------

**The Board of Adjustment consist of five (5) members who are residents of the city, or who reside in the city's extraterritorial jurisdiction, each to be appointed by the Mayor with ratification by the City Council for staggered term of two (2) years.    
The Board of Adjustment convenes on an "as need" basis at Saint Hedwig City Hall.    
  
CHAIRMAN**Brian Barr **[boa@sainthedwigcity.com](mailto:boa@sainthedwigcity.com)**210-667-9568 **BOARD MEMBERS**Carol Mills - Vice Chairman  
David Solarczyk  
Jonathan Kosub  
Amy Massey -Secretary  
  
Alternate #1 - Sarah Cornelius  
Alternate #2 -
